snippet: The Casa Dell'Arte hotel, a 12-suite hotel outside the Aegean beach town of Bodrum that doubles as one of the country's most important contemporary art galleries, starts its artists-in-residence program on April 24.

headline.main: In Bodrum, Turkey, a Hotel for Art and Artists
